title: Azhaikiran Madhavan Lyrics Raghavendrar
stanzas:
Azhaikiran madhavan
aanirai meithavan
manimudiyum
mayil iragum
edhir varavum
thudhi purindhen
maadhavaa keshavaa
sridhara OM.

Thaedinen dheva dhevaa
thamarai paadhame
vaadinen vasudhevaa
vandhadhu neramae.

gnyana vaasal naadinen
vedha gaanam paadinen
kaalam kaalam naan unai
Thaedinen dheva dhevaa
thamarai paadhame

kadhil naan kaetadhu
venu gaanaamirudham
kannil naan kandadhu
kannan birunthavanam

maayane naeyane
maasillaadha thooyane
aathma nyanam adaindha pinnum
Thaedinen dheva dhevaa
thamarai paadhame

Ragavendhra sri ragavendhra
Ragavendhra sri ragavendhra
Ragavendhra Ragavendhra
Ragavendhra  Ragavendhra
guruve saranam(2)

Gynana thirumaeni
kaana varavendumae
seetha poo vanna
padham thola vendumae

bakthan varum podhu
padhai thadaiyaanathe
kaattu peru vellam
aatril uruvaanadhe

thaayaaga dhayai seiyyum
dhevaa
thadai neenga arul
seiyya vaa vaa

naan seitha paavam
yaar theerkka koodum
nee vazhum idam vandhu
naan sera vendum

Ragavendhra sri ragavendhra
Ragavendhra sri ragavendhra
